availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Elder (Nelson County, Kentucky, wagon maker.)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, wagon maker. Maryland native. Married to Mary Ann Bowlds Elder in Nelson County on March 24, 1840. Father of John Elder, G. A. Elder, Edwin Elder, Basil Elder, and Susan Elder. Carpenter in Nelson County in 1850. Wagon maker with his son, John Elder, in Nelson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 288A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 256.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nelson County Marriages, Film #000481488, p. 194 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
